items.sentence: Tom showed no consideration whatsoever for Mary's feelings.
Tom spent the money his grandmother had given him on books.
Remember that you only have three hundred dollars to spend.
Tom spent the night in the basement, sleeping on the floor.
Tom said that he just wanted to spend some time by himself.
Tom will likely go to Australia during his summer vacation.
How much time do you spend getting ready for work each day?
How did you know Tom and Mary were planning to get married?
The body they found in the park hasn't yet been identified.
Tom left Australia and came to New Zealand three years ago.
